name: Great Adventure in the World of Sky
name_original: Great Adventure in the World of Sky
description:
This game is a first-person 3D pixel-style RPG game, it is an infinite open block world, and it also provides a multiplayer online PK mode.
Suddenly you wake up in a world of sky, and your memory becomes blurred. You need to fulfill several tasks to find the secrets of this world. There are dozens of weapons and magic in the game. You can synthesize weapons, upgrade, enchant, and summon NPC, catch pets, ride dragons, defeat various BOSS to get higher level treasures.
Now There is still only one PVP map for multiplayer games, and we plan to make different maps for multiplayer cooperation in the future("Pyramid Escape" is currently being making).We strongly recommend you to play a single-player RPG game at the beginning.2020.4.5
You can play this version before buying，site:http://www.4399.com/flash/212227.htm
